title: Your account is in the process of transferring league of legends
body: I did not chose to change my region! This is my smurf account but I have a 2nd account linked to summoner name Yakob on the NA server. Please someone help meh and yes I did submit a ticket. :3

replies.body: Mmmmmmm someone might be in the process of hacking your account if you weren't the one who put that transfer through! You mentioned having a ticket submitted already, so once you're able to verify yourself as the account creator we'll be able to reverse any damage that was done and get you back on the Rift.

Broporo if you could help with this it would be great. Let me fill you in please, so my legit brother zack raper is the original creator of the account. He didnt want to play anymore, So i did a name change on the account and linked my email to the account, this was back in season 2. Since then I have dumped atleast 600$ into my account and now that it has been stolen from me and had my debit card stolen as well, the actions riot too was to ban my account. I am really sad and dont know what to do.
